short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds quickedit links for the new Contempo, Soho, Emporio and Notable themes, for a user-specified set of blogspot URLs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using a JS contentscript, adds quickedit links to the posts and gadgets on the new themes, which don't support them anymore.
